title: LCS Summer Playoffs tickets on sale!

replies.body: I think you put the wrong dates for each saturday and sunday dates? April 18 and 19th?

Our article accidentally got published for a couple of minutes before it was ready with placeholders from Spring. The finals dates for Summer Playoffs are August 8-9 and 15-16. Thanks for checking in!
Can you please get someone to address the problems with the severe lag many people are experiencing??? Not a single post about it so far and its going on 24 hours for me. Can't even play a game
This isn't the place to complain about lag. And if you are experiencing lag, it might be an issue with your connection, if not that idk.
